title: Starling tops the Best British Bank awards for the third year in succession
description: Banking challenger Starling Bank has been voted ‘Best British Bank’ at the British Bank Awards 2020. Bristol-based Triodos Bank came a close second, while Monzo slips to third spot. Tesco Bank remains the UK’s least loved bank.
content: Banking challenger Starling Bank has been voted Best British Bank at the British Bank Awards Bristol based Triodos Bank came a close second while Monzo slips to third spot Tesco Bank remains the UKs least loved bank Run by Smart Money People the UK chars
